1.5.3.name: wordpress/ratings-shorttags
1.5.3.description:
Simple plugin for inserting ratings into WordPress posts. Adds two shortcodes, [rating=5] and [relatedratings=4], which allow you to insert:

  • a movie or book rating (a four star rating looks like this: ★★★★)
  • a list of related posts with similar ratings
